alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson, southeastern Butte and northwestern Bingham Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Arco, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Terreton, Mud Lake, Atomic City, Northwest Inl, Central Inl, Southeast Inl, Southwest Inl, Howe, and Big Southern Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain
